Name: Juncture I
Desc: Fear not the trivial critter mobs. Just <color=#0f70bc>pull them in and wipe them out</color>.\n<color=#BFBFBF>To Be Continued...</color>
HelpDetail: 1. Fear not the trivial critter mobs! \n2.<color=#4169E1>Pull them in</color> and quickly take them out!

Name: Juncture II
Desc: Fear not the trivial critter mobs. Just <color=#0f70bc>pull them in and wipe them out</color>.\n<color=#BFBFBF>To Be Continued...</color>
HelpDetail: 1. Fear not the trivial critter mobs! \n2.<color=#4169E1>Pull them in</color> and quickly take them out!

Name: Cliff Fortress
Desc: A large number of enemies have blocked the path forward. Focus on breaking through them.
HelpDetail: 1. A large number of enemies have blocked the path forward. Focus on breaking through them.\n2. <color=#4169E1>Defeat</color> enemies or <color=#4169E1>break</color> their Super Armor to enter Matrix.

Name: Juncture III
Desc: Fear not the trivial critter mobs. Just <color=#0f71bc>pull them in and wipe them out</color>.\n<color=#BFBFBF>To Be Continued...</color>
HelpDetail: 1. Fear not the trivial critter mobs! \n2.<color=#4169E1>Pull them in</color> and quickly take them out!

Name: Juncture IV
Desc: Fear not the trivial critter mobs. Just <color=#0f70bc>pull them in and wipe them out</color>.\n<color=#BFBFBF>To Be Continued...</color>
HelpDetail: 1. Fear not the trivial critter mobs! \n2.<color=#4169E1>Pull them in</color> and quickly take them out!

Name: Dark Pass
Desc: The last area of defense before Boss
HelpDetail:
1. Defeat Boss with the tank, preferably using a <color=#4169E1>Uniframe</color>.
2. <color=#4169E1>Executable enemies will be generated at the center of the field at intervals. Execute them to charge the tank</color>.
3. When fully charged, <color=#4169E1>the tank will deal DMG equal to 40% max HP to the Boss</color>.
4. Pull enemies wisely to execute them while dealing DMG to the Boss to clear the stage faster.

Name: Dangerous Cliff
Desc: Upon defeat, the Sovereign will come back with a higher Red Tide Level. All enemies' <color=#4169E1>ATK and HP will increase!</color>
HelpDetail: 1. Upon defeat, the Sovereign will come back with a higher Red Tide Level. All enemies' <color=#4169E1>ATK and HP will increase!</color>\n2. When attacked, the Sovereign will accumulate Red Tide. At full Red Tide, it will cast the Ultimate Signature and enter the Berserk mode temporarily!
